      protected void executeCommand(@NonNull gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.cli.processor.CLIProcessor.CallingContext callingContext, @NonNull org.apache.commons.cli.CommandLine cmdLine) throws gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.cli.processor.command.CommandExecutionException
